message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1300000. This is a competitive offer, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at a price of $1200000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to me is $1500000. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1150000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1200000.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1150000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product at a price of $1225000. This is still a great deal for you, considering the product's worth to me is $1500000. I believe it's a fair compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1150000, as I mentioned earlier. However, I'm willing to make a slight compromise and meet you at $1180000. I believe this is the maximum I can stretch my budget to.

This is still a great deal for you, considering the product's worth to me is $1500000. I believe it's a fair compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.

I appreciate your continued willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, which is the maximum I can stretch my budget to. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1200000. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell the product at $1200000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product at a price of $1220000. This is still a great deal for you, considering the product's worth to me is $1500000. I believe it's a fair compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.

I appreciate your continued willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my budget limit. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. If this isn't acceptable, I'll have to consider buying the product from another seller.
